Package engine

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
engine.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
AttackBuilding, ProductionBuilding, Ressource, SiteConstruction, StorageBuilding, Unit
public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
this class is core this is the first class of all entity of the game like fighter, worker, building and ressource not abstract because we need it to draw all entity
Author:
gautier

  • Constructor Details

    • Entity

      public Entity​(int hp, int hpMax, java.lang.String description, Position position, int id, int faction, int sightRange, int maxFrame, GraphicsManager graphicsManager)
      constructor of entity
      Parameters:
      hp - hp of entity
      hpMax - hpMax of entity
      description - description use on panel
      position - current position of entity
      id - id of the entity
      faction - faction of the entity
      sightRange - sightRange of the entity
      maxFrame - max frame use to this entity
      graphicsManager - need to create animation
